item.title: Kuhn och Popper
item.description: Paradigm och falsifiering Kuhn och Popper. Note the retrograde motion of Mars on the right. Yellow dot, Sun; blue, Earth; red, Mars. (In order to create a smooth animation, it is assumed that the period of revolution of Mars is exactly 2 years, instead of the actual value, 1.

item.title: Brain Waves
item.description: Brain Waves En artikel i nature om â€œhjÃ¤rnvÃ¥gorâ€ och deras eventuella betydelse. NÃ¤mner bla forskning av Li-Huei Tsai som anvÃ¤nt ljus fÃ¶r att pÃ¥verka amylodia plack, och funnit viss pÃ¥verkan pÃ¥ mikroglia av behandlingen. The oscillations also provide a potential mechanism for how the brain creates a coherent experience from the chaotic symphony of stimuli hitting the senses at any one time, a puzzle known as the â€˜binding problemâ€™. By synchronizing the firing rates of neurons responding to the same event, brainwaves might ensure that the all of the relevant information relating to one object arrives at the correct area of the brain at exactly the right time.
